response.original_title: Amelia McLean - Live at The Hotel Cafe
response.overview: On October 15, 2025, Amelia McLean played to a packed house in the heart of Hollywood to promote her full length debut, "Frowned Upon Daughter". Amelia played the entire album, pouring her heart and her immense talent into a performance that was captivating and joyful.  The show was captured in full and is presented here.  Amelia McLean - Piano / Vocals  Justin Glasco - Bass / Acoustic Guitar / Backing Vocals  Mark McKee - Keys  Kiel Feher - Drums  Paul Redel - Guitar  Wholesoul Strings  Daniel Lim - Cello  Andrew Kwon - Violin  Drew Forde - Viola  All songs written Amelia McLean  Video and Audio courtesy of The Hotel Cafe, Los Angeles  Editing by Kevin Brown for 8NINTEY8 AUTHENTIC ROCK N ROLL  Copyright 2025 Amelia McLean Music
response.title: Amelia McLean - Live at The Hotel Cafe
